title: Font size
body: Is there any way to currently change the font size of the displays in game? Things like my level numbers, summoner names and announcements are really big and out of proportion

replies.body:
Tell me if i need to reupload the image:
http://puu.sh/dIIW4/1bf4ed2861.jpg
Do you have a screenshot of this? It could be that your computer is missing the fonts, and thus it's falling back on simpler fonts, which aren't sized the way Riot had intended it.
